name: x-sp-atk-2
effect: Used on a party Pokémon in battle : Raises the target’s Special Attack by two stages. This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
short_effect: Raises Special Attack by two stages in battle. Wonder Launcher only.

flavor_text.black_white: It sharply raises the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It sharply raises the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokémon in battle. It wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.
